akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary, acting through the Under Secretary for Science and Technology, shall designate the laboratory described in subsection (b) as an additional laboratory pursuant to the authority under section 188(c)(2) of this title, which shall be used to conduct studies, analyses, and research to assess and address domestic chemical security events.
(b) Laboratory described The laboratory described in this subsection is the laboratory known, as of December 23, 2022, as the Chemical Security Analysis Center.
